value.name: Police respond to attempted abduction at McMinn Soccer Complex
value.description: ATHENS, Tenn. (WATE) — Athens Police are investigating an incident involving a man who reportedly attempted to abduct an Athens Middle School student at the McMinn Soccer Complex Tuesday afternoon.

value.name: Townsend passes proposed budget as tourism-heavy summer looms
value.description: Townsend City Commission late Tuesday unanimously passed the fiscal 2022 budget on first reading just as the Smoky Mountains summer tourism season begins in earnest.
